I almost got kicked out for a simple mode, and this guy is talking back on
the rules and moding severely, when I moded I always took it back, now my
hard work pays off into this? Ugh! I don't believe my eyes! It states
clearly in the rules that no bot can be too powerful, and I wouldn't cal an
owner of the RPG a great ass if I were you, I've been madder and have never
called them anything, I'd be more careful Shomin!...
